content.prompt: In 1713 Emperor Charles VI sought approval of the Pragmatic Sanction in order to guarantee the

choices.label: borders between Holland and the Austrian Netherlands
dynastic union of the Hapsburgs and the Romanovs
succession of the Bourbons to the Spanish throne
succession of the Hanover family to the English throne

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
